com.axelor.studio.service

Class RightManagementService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.axelor.studio.service.RightManagementService

  • public class RightManagementService
extends java.lang.Object
    This service class create Permissions and MetaPermissions from RightManagement objects. MetaModel and MetaField contains o2m to RightManagement for model and field permission.
    Author:
    axelor
